description.value:
Your faith provides temporary protection in addition to healing. If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Harm]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Heal]{Heal} on a single target and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Defensive Recovery]{Effect: Defensive Recovery}
